rooms.description: A spacious entrance area with Vastu compliant positioning of the main door to the east for positive energy.
An open-plan living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows along the south facade for natural lighting and a calming view. The design ensures unobstructed sunlight.
Adjacent to the living room with ample space for dining, incorporating Vastu principles by aligning seating towards the south-east for prosperity.
A dedicated entertainment space designed with soundproof walls and ambient lighting. Flooring is chosen to enhance acoustics; placement ensures a clear line of sight from seating.
Modern kitchen placed near the dining area with proper ventilation and adherence to Vastu guidelines for fire safety. The layout facilitates easy movement between cooking and dining areas.
Includes storage, washing area, and a small pantry. Positioned to avoid interfering with primary living spaces while maintaining efficient flow.

openings.description: Main entrance door following Vastu by aligning the main door on the east side for prosperity.

openings.location: South facade of Living Room and Home Theater
openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows that maximize natural light and create a seamless indoor-outdoor connection. These openings are designed to enhance ventilation while maintaining privacy.
